title: Seminar on Career in Software Testing
description: Software testing isn't just about finding bugs or getting things done by looking at some random checklist. Apart from these, many things are involved in it.
motivation: Something interesting is waiting for the students in this seminar, to know which one must attend the seminar.

title: Future skills to bridge the gap between Industry & Academia
description: UIU & we are going to jointly organize a Webinar titled 'Future skills to bridge the gap between Industry & Academia'
motivation: To know details about the future skill of Industry please join the webinar in the following schedule.

title: Workshop on 3D Design and Printing Pipeline || FabLab
description: FabLab & we are going to jointly organize a Workshop on 3D Design and Printing Pipeline. This workshop is perfect for anyone who wants to learn about this exciting technology, whether you are a beginner or have some prior experience with 3D design and printing.
motivation: Don't miss out on this valuable opportunity to develop your skills and expand your knowledge in this growing field. If you wish to become an entrepreneur, this workshop may give you new business ideas and knowledge required to be successful in that.

event_info.location: Ground Floor of Innovation Lab, DIU-DSC

title: Workshop on 'Quality Research and Impactful Publications'
description: Research means to carefully analyze the problems or to do a detailed study of the specific problems, by making use of special scientific methods. Research papers are an excellent platform to disseminate a novel finding to a general or focused audience, which may be interested in replicating the experiments; identifying advanced applications for the finding, etc. as well as to popularize your research to the world and prevent duplication of the study.
motivation: Register for 'Quality Research and Impactful Publications' to avail these opportunities.

event_info.location: Ground Floor of Innovation Lab, DIU-DSC

title: Register now to join 'DIU Job Utsob-2023' & crack your dream job!!
description: The event aims to explore Job and Internship Placements Opportunities for our DIU Graduating Students of different disciplines, where we are expecting about 250 employers from 35 individual Job-Industry segments will participate with their on-going  job openings, Spot Job Interviews, Resume Collections for future references and Career Grooming workshops.
motivation: You are invited to register for this mega Job Utsob, appear for the shortlisted recruitment process, and crack a dream job as available.
